#summary !ComponentType Binary Data Field

= !ComponentType Binary Data Field =


Within a [Bin_T_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_MediaBox media atom] this is a [T_MP4_AtomicCode four-character code] that identifies the type of the handler. Only two values are valid for this field: {{{'mhlr'}}} for media handlers and {{{'dhlr'}}} for data handlers.

Within a [Bin_T_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_MetaBox meta box] this is a predefined integer that is set to 0.

*Serialization Namespace:*  [Bin_N_MP4 MP4]<br>*Assembly:*  MP4 (in MP4.dll)
== Data Serialization ==

=== Field Value ===
Type: *UInt32* — a 32-bit (4 bytes) unsigned integer <br>
